text:
Doting Granddad: Charles has spoken of the joy of having a third grandchild

The heir to the throne, who turns 70 this year, said it was a “great joy” to become a grandad again.

Princess Kate and delighted dad Prince William took their new arrival home from hospital on Monday night.

The royal bundle, who weighed 8lb 7oz, is settling in at Kensington Palace with his brother George, four, and two-year-old sister Charlotte.

Doting Prince Charles said: “It is a great joy to have another grandchild.

“The only trouble is I don’t know how I am going to keep up with them.”
title: Royal Baby: Doting Prince Charles jokes he can't 'keep up' with three grandchildren
